venue.name: Vin & Eddie's Ristorante and Wine Bar

item.description:
Once again responding to members' suggestions, we are planning to visit Vin & Eddie's Ristorante and Wine Bar in Abington.

Open since 1979, Vin & Eddie's was serving fine Italian food on the South Shore long before anyone had heard of Tosca, and it remains a favorite for many people today. Dishes coming out of their kitchen include things as seemingly pedestrian as chicken parmigiana ($14.00, served over good-quality linguine) and as exotic as crispy duck leg with stewed lentils and baby greens (an appetizer for $9.00). Desserts, including white chocolate mouse in a dark chocolate shell with creme anglaise & raspberry puree ($7.00), also merit the serious diner's attention.

Please join us at 7:00 PM on Thursday, November 29 as we travel down Route 18 to sample the fare of a restaurant that long ago achieved "institution" status.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

DIRECTIONS:

From The North:

Take Route 3 South to exit 16B. (South Weymouth/

Abington), which will put you on Rt 18. Follow Rt 18 4 1/2 miles

South. After entering Abington, 1/3 of mile on the right hand side

you will see Vin & Eddies. (1400 Bedford St)


From the South:

Take Route 3 north to exit 16 (Weymouth Rt 18), at the end of the exit,

take a left onto Rt 18 and follow South for 4 1/2 miles. Vin & Eddies is

located on the right hand side on Rt 18, just beyond the Abington-Weymouth

Line.


Parking presents no problem as Vin & Eddie's has a substantial lot. Please look for Mike at the entrance to the restaurant barring inclement weather. Should you somehow miss the main group, both Mike's name and the name "South Shore Meetup Group" were given with our reservation.

RSVP DEADLINE: Wednesday, November 28 by 5:00 PM

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

WHEN and WHERE:

Thursday, November 29 at 7:00 PM
Vin & Eddie's Ristorante and Wine Bar
1400 Bedford St (Route 18), Abington, MA 02351

PRICE RANGE: Entrees start at around $14.00, with many pasta dishes under $20.00. Some entrees are priced in the mid to high $20's.

HANDICAPPED ACCESS: Yes

ORGANIZER: Mike

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner at Vin & Eddie's
